message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can't afford it at $20,000. Would you consider lowering the price to $14,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is a bit too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on $15,000 for the product?
